name: Surviving The Shift - BETA
description:
Controls:

A & D Keyboard Keys = Player Movement

Spacebar = Shoot

Left Click + Right Click = Throw Granade

E = Interact & Quit Upgrade Zone

Left Click on Ally Unit Pictures = Spawn Ally Unit

To Heal Yourself = Stand BELOW the CROSS in the GuardHouse

(*This can only be done 3 times per wave)

- Have fun and leave feedback on what your experience was with the prototype!
